rooms.description: Large open space with minimalistic Scandinavian interior design, featuring a central seating area and ample natural light through large windows.
Spacious dining room adjacent to the living room with a modern Scandinavian aesthetic, complemented by wooden accents.
Functional kitchen designed in line with Scandinavian principles emphasizing clean lines and practical storage. Incorporates modern appliances and natural light.
Luxurious master bedroom with en-suite bathroom, providing privacy and a serene atmosphere. Designed to face the northeast for auspicious energy.
Comfortable bedroom suitable for children or a guest. Features minimalist decor and is oriented towards the east to harness positive energy.
Additional bedroom for family members or extended stays. Maintains Scandinavian simplicity and is located in the south-east corner for balance.
A dedicated library space with built-in bookshelves and comfortable reading nooks. Positioned in the west to promote knowledge and creativity.
A dedicated home theater room with optimized acoustics and ambient lighting. Carefully designed to enhance the viewing experience.
Multi-purpose utility room for storage or laundry, ensuring functionality and ease of access.

openings.description: A welcoming entrance that adheres to Vastu principles by facing the east. It features a minimalistic design with Scandinavian simplicity.
Automated two-car garage door integrated into the ground floor, designed for ease of access while maintaining aesthetic continuity.
